newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD WOMEN'S MARATHON CHAMPION SUZUKI.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD WOMEN'S MARATHON CHAMPION SUZUKI.

text.p: Profile of Hiromi Suzuki, who won the women's world marathon title on Saturday.
Switched to marathon running last year and finished second on her debut in the Osaka marathon.
Japanese champion over 10,000 metres in 1995 and 1996. Finished 16th in the Olympic 10,000 final in Atlanta after finishing eighth at the Gothenburg world championships 10,000 metres in 1995.
Finished second in the Nagoya marathon earlier this year.
